escapeXML(Appendable, CharSequence) - Static method in class org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils
Escapes the characters in a String using XML entities and writes them to an Appendable.

For example:

"bread" & "butter"

becomes:

&quot;bread&quot; &amp; &quot;butter&quot;.

Delegates to StringUtils.escapeXML(Appendable,CharSequence).
escapeXML(CharSequence) - Static method in class org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils
Escapes the characters in a String using XML entities.

For example:

"bread" & "butter"

becomes:

&quot;bread&quot; &amp; &quot;butter&quot;.

Delegates to StringUtils.escapeXML(CharSequence).
